locations.name: Bangkok
locations.description: The vibrant capital city, the starting point of the tour, known for its temples, canals, floating markets, and street food.

locations.name: Chiang Mai
locations.description: Located in Northern Thailand, known as the 'Rose of the North', offering cultural experiences, mountain scenery, ethical elephant interactions, and artisan crafts.

locations.name: Phuket
locations.description: A world-renowned southern island, the final destination focused on relaxation, beaches, turquoise waters, island hopping, and potentially luxury accommodations.
